domain.action

Class AtomicActionCatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.update.BasicUpdateSource
      • domain.action.AtomicAction
        • domain.action.AtomicActionCatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction, IBasicUpdateSource

    public class AtomicActionCatch
extends AtomicAction
    Represents a concrete AtomicAction, more specifically the atomic catch action.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AtomicActionCatch

        public AtomicActionCatch(DiagonalLocationPair pair)
        Creates a new AtomicActionCatch based on the given DiagonalLocationPair.
        Parameters:
        pair - The from and to Locations of this pair will determine the start- and endpoints of this AtomicActionCatch.

    • Method Detail

      • isValidOn

        public boolean isValidOn(IReadOnlyBoard board,
                         Player currentPlayer)
        Returns true if this IAction is valid on the given IBoard and for the given Player, false otherwise. AtomicActionCatches are valid iff the following conditions are fulfilled:
        • Both starting and landing square are black
        • The starting square contains a piece of the current player
        • The landing square is empty
        • The starting and landing squares are exactly a diagonal distance of two apart
        • The square in the center between start and end contains a piece from the opponent
        • If the landing square lies behind the starting square, backwards catching must be enabled

      • executeOn

        public void executeOn(IBoard board,
                      Player currentPlayer)
        Description copied from interface: IAction
        Executes this IAction on the given IBoard for the given Player. Execution cannot proceed if this IAction is not valid on the given IBoard.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Specified by:

      • isCatch

        public boolean isCatch()
        Description copied from interface: IAction
        Returns true if this IAction performs a catch, false otherwise.
